This game is a mixed bag for me. In one hand it's an enjoyable game that I have a lot of fun playing with my friends and on my own. It's an amazing game for people who love horror media and the 3 people that still play Friday The 13th The Game and it's overall a decently made, "chill" (At some points), and fun game. However, As a person who has played 300 hours on my Switch and is currently almost on 100 hours on PC I think I have the right to say this game has some problems. Balancing, game design, and the developers themselves. Let's start off with the big thing. Balancing. For every multiplayer game out there that involves 2 sides fighting against each other, it is pretty important to make it fair for both sides. Some games have no problem doing this. Dead By Daylight however, well, let me put in a simple and kind manner, it struggles with this a lot. 
             Now you see, I don't blame Behaviour at all with this problem. Well. Partially at least. There is what? Like almost 30 killers and survivors in the game? I think they really screwed themselves over with the "3 or 4 chapters a year" promise. Every killer, and every survivor has to have different perks that are different everytime, every killer has to have a balanced power that's unique and can work with different maps and situations. AND, they have to make all of this, in like 3 months. A simple solution would be shortening that 3 or 4 chapters to 1 or 2. OR. Release 1 chapter a year, and spend the rest of your god damn time and money to fix the game instead of releasing new chapters and cosmetics. Now on to what I was saying before. Taking a break once in a while and fixing past killer's powers and animations and add-ons and perks for both killer's and survivors, fixing maps, adding gamemodes that are out of the same asymmetrical 4 v 1 aspect that has been the norm for 6 fucking years would be amazing. But. That goes on to my next point.
            Behaviour Interactive Inc. is what I would call a company that is oblivious to its audiences responses. "Ay Behaviour, fix this ongoing problem where console players can barely play the game because of lag.", "Oi Behavior, this perk needs a fixing, it is incredibly useless, could you take a look at it?", Buenos Diaz Behaviour, why did you nerf Pig for the hundredth fucking time instead of focusing on killers who NEED IT!". Well simple answer. Behaviour doesn't give a shit, because they are living paradise without any competitors trying to follow their footsteps of being the best in the genre. So BE (Which is what I'm abbreviating the name to because I'm tired of writing the entire name down.)  Thinks that they can be lazy and stay in their own world while posting yet another cosmetic pack for Meg and Legion. Some person told me this long ago and I remember it still today. "Le comportement sort de ta t√™te". Which for those who don't speak French, means Behaviour get out of your head. I don't care, about the new Glow In The Dark cosmetic pack that includes Claudette with a green neon shirt and a different hairstyle for 15 dollars. I care about the Raccoon Police Station Map to be smaller in size and for my mans Michael and Pig and Clown and Hillbilly and Trapper and Legion to get fixed to actually have a chance to go from F teir, to at least B. Cause y'know what BE, a million complaints have been thrown at you but i think what we all are thinking is, "Listen to the community, and get your fucking head, outcha fucking ass. And realize, that your game, is spiraling at a increase in speed, down the dumpster, and that you should fix it, before Dead By Daylight, is just named Dead. Because nobody will want to play it. And don't you want that money? That you so want based on the cosmetic packs you throw at a incredibly overpriced rate? Well you could get that for decades if you fix your game, or you could get it for a couple years if you waste your time while you watch your game go down the drain. Think about it Behaviour. What do you want."
           This game is fun. Yes. But this game is complicated in how I would place it in a 5 star rating. The game is good. However it pains me how much potential it has to be something so much better. To upgrade that "good" to a "amazing". And that's why I'm putting it in a 3 in a half stars. I would put it in a 3 and 3 quarters of the way filled stars if i could. But I can't. I will still play this game. Because I have a lot of fun with it. But I'm putting my rating like this because of the reasons I've already mentioned in this review. And they are some big fucking reasons why I am rating it this way. However, it seems like Behaviour is stepping up their game a bit. Which I can only assume will increase when this new opponent "VHS" enters the ring. But I unfortunately believe this will not stop anything. And only will go back, to how things were. Maybe worse.
             Dead By Daylight is a good game. It has a lot of problems that need to be addressed. I would put Dead By Daylight in a 5 star rating of 3 and a half stars. Goodbye now.

A lot of fun to play with friends. Takes a couple games to get the hang of it. I highly recommend playing both killer and survivor just to figure out what you like. Also read up on characters and figure out what perks are good and what aren't so good.

This game has melted down to campy killers and not helpful survivors. If you are caught by the killer, the killer will typically do 2 things. They will tunnel you out  or camp your hook. It makes this game impossible to climb ranks if you solo queue.
Um dos melhores jogos para se jogar tanto solo quanto com amigos.
I hope an update comes out where more bugs are fixed, before they focus on different killers/survivors and cosmetics. Still! Fun to play, a great laugh! :)

Fun game,biggest complaint would be the buggy state of new patches

not worth buying very fun game if you get good dont get me wrong but in the end youll wish you saved your money and spent your time elsewhere. in my opinion the game is killer sided from the intended gameplay to the stupid little bugs that happen like dead hard not working or getting smacked after dropping and stunning the killer with a pallet the list can go on. being face camped or tunneled because you played well doesnt make the game very fun either and not having any real way to combat against this makes some games feel hopeless and if you disconnect for any reason including but not limited to your internet shutting off you will get banned from matchmaking for a period of time which is absurd to an extent. There is no in game voice chat to communicate with eachother so that kinda sucks and overall just save your money.
{edit 5-22-22} matchmaking is unbalanced still, no party chat for teammates (rocket league just did this)
no real explanation on how the game is actually played ex. looping, hugging walls, 360s, flashlight saves or pallet saves. The game feels like every man for themselves with randoms, server locations are horrible for me atleast constant 70+ ms. i see the killer swing and absurdly long distance even tho on his end his was on my tail. Hit detection needs work STILL. How did you hit me when im behind you?

Had almost a 150 hours into the game. I enjoyed playing with my friends and the theme of the game with the killers and trying to escape.
But this company get keeping going backwards in developing the game. You think after 5-6 years of being release they would have fixed all the game crashing, map balancing, perk balancing, killer vs survivor balancing, random map generating, match making, generators, totem placements and so much more. But no, they keep having issues and more issue every killer and patch they do. I feels like they got a fan base and now just trying to cash out on them and not fix the major issues before leasing new content. To me the greed feels to real now.
With the newer killer pinhead out games have not been enjoyable with matches DCing ever couple of game, either the killer or survivor because of memory leeks or what ever. They known the issues durning play testing but still decide to rush it out knowing these issue and people would still buy it. This my friends is company greed.
Losing licensing agreements for what ever reason is very sad, the stranger things is gone in a few weeks. Current people can buy it and still play in the future with those characters, but the sad thing is in the future with new people joining because they seen people play with demogordn or steve or Nancy and they can‚Äôt never get them hurts.
Now they are planing to reward players with ranks, the higher the rank the more extra stuff you get. The last week after this news came out the games have been hard core unenjoyable. Killer are so desperate to kill they now camp and tunnel the person right off of hook. Survivor now leave that person on hook just to work on gens and if you are a random player good luck of getting rescued. Game play when from somewhat joy able to down right not even worth having on my PC anymore.

If you ask me, don‚Äôt buy this game! Save your money, Save your sanity, and save your self headaches with something so incredibly unbalanced and unfun to play.

To the dev. You had something good. Now you have a pile of crap sitting in your office. Just a matter of time before people wake up and uninstall the game. You have to fix your maps, killer and perks! You have to fix the hit boxes and major desink issues in the game. Work on the game and not more dlc so people can play it and enjoy it!
